resources.string: 1) What is the name of the Udacity Chief Executive Officer?
2) Who is/are the founder(s) of WhatsApp?
3) Simplify the this mathematical expression, 9 *2 +(12/4). What is the result?
4) What is the name of the President of Ghana?
5) The following are some of the names of mountains that can be found in Africa. Select the highest?
6) In Ghana, the name of the first sitting president to have died is.....?
7) How many years has former President Mugabe, president of Zimbabwe, ruled before overthrown by military coup?
8) The former President of United States of America, President Barack Obama, comes from which of the following Africa countries?
9) The human heart has how many valves?
10) Which of the following deficiencies is caused by iodine deficiency?

" The Quiz contains 10 general questions. From Question 1 to 8, your answer will be marked instantly and so you are advised to think carefully before making your choice since other optional answers will be deactivated unless you restart the whole quiz. Press on the Mark button to mark only question 9 which will be followed by a feedback. Question 10 will also be marked automatically with a feedback on your selected answer. Good Luck"
